node_list.description: Here we investigate what are the essential properties that a good Programmer must have.
I think programming is the most important skill that a programmer must have.
Technology is changing so fast, as a good programmer, he or she must be an efficient learner.
No single programmer can make a really big software system, teamwork is also essential for each programmer in a good team.
Fundamental programming languages like C, C++, and Java are very basic but versatile languages, each good programmer should be able to use at least one of these languages.
Scripting languages like Python, Shell, Perl etc. are powerful tools and essential in complex enterprise systems, a good programmer should be familiar with at least one of them

node_list.text: Be familiar with famous Design patterns and Frameworks
node_list.description: Famous design patterns like MVC, MVVM etc. and their corresponding programming frameworks are very popular and useful in the real world applications, a good programmer should be able to apply some of them in their work.

node_list.text: Good at Reading Documentations and Source Code
node_list.description: To master a new technology, the fastest and safe way is to read the official documentation and source code if available, a good programmer should be good at this.

node_list.text: Good at Applying new Technology in the real applications
node_list.description: New technologies emerge very swiftly, as a good programmer, he or shw should be able to pick and apply suitable technology for their real applications.
A good communication skill is important for a good programmer to exchange ideas and discuss about sophisticated problems with his or her teammates.

node_list.text: Be familiar with popular collaborative programming tools
node_list.description: Some collaborative programming tools like Git, SVN etc. are important for large-scale software projects, a good programmer should be familiar with them to work effectively in a cooperative programming environment.
